data.title: why is Sharon's hair still brown?
data.meta_description: Don’t ya think she would be showing her blond roots by now? ~)
data.text:
If you hadn’t noticed when she was blonde she had dark roots. Also she wouldn’t have time to dye her hair back since she’s in jail… lol

I don’t think bleaching hair dye is on the approved list of items an inmate an purchase in jail.

That could be used as a weapon in the pen!

Quote PhylFan: I like her hair color better with the darker hue, hope she keeps it.

ICAM Looks so much healthier and just does so much more for her complexion and face. She looks younger too. Love the cinnamon hue

I hope she keeps it too. That colour looks terrific on her!

Remember all the threads about Patti’s hair and how we were all trying to figure out what colour HER roots were?

LOL, who said blond was her natural color… That could be why she didn’t need touch ups during her time on the ranch…

(i mean the character, not the actress…)

Quote PurrrrrrrKitty: I read an article by Sharon Case saying.... her hair color will become lighter and lighter as she becomes Sharon and returns to her normal life...

“As she becomes Sharon” LMAO!!! Wait…wasn’t she ALWAYS Sharon…or did she automatically change into Sheri in more than just name?

So then if I want to be someone else or look like someone else…all I have to do is change my name?

OK…my name is Kim Kardashian!!!

Was it just me or did Sharon’s hair look nicer when she was being “Sherri”… it was more styled and polished… not stringy and all in her face aha.
